// libraries import React, { Component } from 'react' import get from 'lodash/get' // Components import { formatCurrency } from 'utils' export default class IsrArrend extends Component { render () { const { calculation } = this.props return (

Concepto

Monto

Ingresos

Gravados al 16%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['taxed_incomes_16'], 0) )}

Gravados al 8%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['taxed_incomes_8'], 0) )}

Exentos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['exempted_incomes'], 0) )}

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['total_incomes'], 0) )}

Gastos

Deducci√≥n optativa

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['optional_deduction'], 0) )}

Otros impuestos o derechos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['other_taxes_rights'], 0) )}

Predial, contribuciones locales de mejoras

{formatCurrency( get( calculation.lease_isr, ['property_tax_local_improvement'], 0 ) )}

Impuesto local

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['proportional_local_tax'], 0) )}

Mantenimiento de bien y consumo de agua

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['water_consumption'], 0) )}

Intereses reales

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.lease_isr, ['real_tax'], 0))}

Salarios, comisiones, honorarios

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['salaries_comission_fees'], 0) )}

Primas de seguros

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['insurance_cost'], 0) )}

Total en el periodo

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['total_expenses'], 0) )}

Base Gravable

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['taxed_base'], 0) )}

L√≠mite inferior

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['lower_limit'], 0) )}

Excedente sobre l√≠mite inferior

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['excess_over_lower_limit'], 0) )}

Porcentaje aplicable al l√≠mite inferior

{get(calculation.lease_isr, ['applicable_percentage'], 0)}%

Impuesto marginal

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.lease_isr, ['marginal_tax'], 0) )}

Cuota fija

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.lease_isr, ['fixed_fee'], 0))}
